title: Here’s a look at Apple’s filings with the Ninth Circuit Court in the Epic Games case
content:
Apple last year requested a delay in the App Store changes that were required as a result of the Epic Games vs. Apple ruling. We now have access to Apple’s filings with the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals on the case.

more…

The post Here’s a look at Apple’s filings with the Ninth Circuit Court in the Epic Games case appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: We now have access to Apple's filings with the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals on the Apple vs. Epic Games case.
